issue.title: Google Play: com.vkontakte.android
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vkontakte.android&hl=ru](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.vkontakte.android%26hl%3Dru) ### Comment > С недавних пор стала замечать, что на телефоне в приложении ВК (и в других соц сетях) стала появляться реклама. При чем на компьютере в ленте ВК нет рекламы , AdGuard работает отлично, видимо). А вот на смартфоне проскакивает. В ленте новостей 2-3,иногда 4 поста , потом реклама идёт , далее снова 3-4поста и снова реклама. Может что-то в настройках AdGuard сбилось после обновления или дополнительно надо что-то включить, чтобы не было таких рекламных постоа.Подскажите, пожалуйста)) Username: `@Татьяна ` ### Screenshots

```adblock
superpsx.com#@#.google-ad
```
to user rules?

By the way, `EasyList` is included in `AdGuard Base filter` so it can be disabled.

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try leave only AdGuard filters without `AdGuard Mobile Ads`, update them (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

issue.title: nytimes.com broken, dom filter prevent clicking links

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.61.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.nytimes.com/

### Ad Blocking

EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. The website display correctly, but interactivity is broken. For instance, the homepage display everything as expected, include headlines, pictures, etc, but it's impossible to click on headlines and other links. 

A filter prevent dismissing a pop-up. Links are inactive until the user dismiss the popup. 

Using uBlock origin's debug tools, I'm able to blame the following esthetic filter.

Filter: `nytimes.com###complianceOverlay`
Filter type: dom
Filter list: AdGuard Annoyances filter

2. Screenshots: none. The issue is non-visual. 


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
IMO rule is bad, click under pop-up is disabled without `trusted-click-element` form list "uBo Cookie Notices".

If they use the <dialog> tag, consider using:

```adb
nytimes.com#$##complianceOverlay { remove: true }
```

When simple JS or CSS is used to freeze clicks and touches, uAsset together with ELC may be playing it safe and prefer clicking over periodically verifying the operation of filters to annoyance.
